ack.p: We are grateful to workshop and interview participants and to those who helped organise the workshops and interviews, in particular, Il’ya Alimaev, Bakytgul Elchibaeva, Asel Imangozhina, Nikolai Kasatkin, Roza Moldobaeva, Aidos Smailov, and Aleksandr Yegorov. We also extend our gratitude to Carol Kerven, Maria Shahgedanova, Nodir Djanibekov, Maya İskenderova and all members of the project for their feedback, suggestions and constructive criticism.
